QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_AirTerminalBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all types of air terminals.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross weight of the footing without add-on parts, not taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: Perimeter
QtoDef.Definition: Perimeter of the profile for calculating the surface area. For example measured in mm.

QtoDef.Name: TotalSurfaceArea
QtoDef.Definition: Gross area of the air terminal face plate.
